Does Updates are possible in Pinot ?

Pinot does not support direct update to rows right now. You can drop and update your entire segments if required. That being said, we are considering different options to provide update capabilities in the future.

Yarn uses a deterministic algorithm that builds up the entire dependency tree before placing files where they need to be.
